description:
Refreshing Ginger Beer, only for grown-ups.

Directions
Serve over ice with a slice.
1. Chill. Take a bottle of chilled Crabbie's Alcoholic Ginger Beer from the fridge.
2. Ice. Fill a glass with ice.
3. Pour. Tilt glass and pour in your Crabbie's Alcoholic Ginger Beer.
4. Slice. Take a slice of lemon or lime, drop into your drink and enjoy!
title: Crabbie's® Original Alcoholic Ginger Beer - 4pk / 11oz Bottles

description:
Blackberry Infused Pear Cider: Naturally fermented using 100% pear juice, not from pear juice concentrate, or flavored hard apple cider. Filtered cold for extra purity and infused with natural blackberry juice. With no added colorants, sugar, sorbate or benzoate preservatives. No added malt, spirit, grape or apple alcohols. Fox Barrel Pear Ciders are crisp and adult, with a fresh natural fruit taste profile and a clean, sophisticated mouthfeel and lingering aftertaste.

Directions
Serve chilled. Please enjoy Fox Barrel Pear Ciders responsibly.

description: Smooth over ice with organic honey. Give a full bottoms-up tilt and swirl to disperse residual apple-wine sediment evenly & serve over fresh ice. Experience a earthy, fruity bouquet with an authentic cidery aroma with hints of honey and a creamy full-bodied flavor with unusual complexity. Naturally fermented using premium apple juice blend, not from concentrate, with no added malt, spirit or grape alcohol. Honey Crisp Artisanal Reserve, Cloudy Hard Cider is unfiltered and uses racked unfiltered apple wine smoothed with pure organic honey, and no added sugar, colorants or Sorbate or benzoate preservatives, and is best served cold for smooth, crisp refreshment.

description: We use 17 varieties of apples, waiting until they drop before pressing and filtering them in the traditional way. We take time to ferment the cider and even more time to let it mature, up to 2 years in fact, tasting it along the way. Sure, there are faster ways of making cider, but then it wouldn’t be Magners.

description: Belgian trappist yeasts and organic maple syrup. Give a full bottoms-up tilt and swirl to disperse residual apple-wine sediment evenly & serve over fresh ice. Experience a sweetly floral to herbal aromatic bouquet and an elegant yeasty flavor with a sustained mouth-feel that develops complexity on the palate. Naturally fermented with Belgian Trappist beer yeasts using a premium apple juice blend, not from concentrate, with no added malt, spirit or grape alcohol. The Saint Artisanal Reserve, Cloudy Hard Cider is unfiltered and uses racked unfiltered apple wine smoothed with pure organic maple syrup, a kiss of apple juice, no added sugar, colorants or Sorbate or benzoate preservatives, and is best served cold for bold, crisp refreshment.

description: Jack-O Traveler is an alluring beer illuminated by the tastes of fall. He strikes a perfect balance between bright refreshment and seasonal spice. Jack is made with real pumpkin for a delicious, dark-hued, shandy-inspired beer. Representing the darker side of shandy. Driven by an obsessive love of high jinks, the Jack-O Traveler spent his days cooking up mischief for everyone who crossed his path. One of his favorite pranks involved tricking unsuspecting bar patrons into buying him beers and then skipping out just when it was his turn to buy a round. 6Pk
title: The Traveler Beer Co.® Jack-O Traveler Pumpkin Shandy - 6pk / 12oz Bottles

description: Sonoma The Anvil Bourbon Cider David and Robert both love bourbon. We mean love bourbon. Maybe that's why they didn't beat around the bush here. Sure, you can age subtly in bourbon barrels. And subtlety is sometimes enough. But, with the Anvil, the real spark ignited when we tossed nuance aside and added a healthy measure of our proprietary barrel-proof bourbon flavor. Suddenly, something intense, alive and memorable happened. To our palates, it offers a clean, lively, aromatic presence with a layered smoky finish. It's truly integrated and rounded, yet vitally distinct. Enjoy.
title: Sonoma Cider® The Anvil Bourbon Cider - 4pk / 12oz Bottles

description:
3 of each:
Amber Our original small batch hard cider. Crisp and refreshing, the delicious recipe remains the same since the first hand filled bottle left our local cidery. (5% alcohol by volume)

802 Crisp like a fresh apple and finishes clean, 802 gets its tawny brown color from the caramelized sugar added to each small batch in a centuries old cider making tradition. 3 bottles. (5% alcohol/volume)

Granny Smith is tart and refreshing. Made from 100% Granny Smith apples. Light in color and refreshing down to the last sip, it's perfect for those who like their cider on the tart and drier side. (5% alcohol by volume)

The Cider Maker's Choice will vary from one of our crisp and refreshing core styles to the rare availability of our limited releases. Variety is truly the spice of life.
title: Woodchuck® Variety Pack - 12pk / 12oz Bottles
